hwDhcpSnpMib.contactinfo: Huawei Industrial Base Bantian, Longgang Shenzhen 518129 People's Republic of China Website: http://www.huawei.com Email: support@huawei.com
hwDhcpSnpMib.description: This MIB describes objects used for DHCP Snooping.
hwDhcpSnpMib.name: hwDhcpSnpMib

revisions.description: This MIB describes objects used for DHCP Snooping.
This revision adds MIB trap of bridge domain.

This MIB describes objects used for DHCP Snooping,including configuring snooping,creating snooping bind table and collecting false packets' statistic information. When the system is attacked, some traps will be given.
The initial revision of this MIB module.

hwDhcpSnpMibGroups.description: The compliance statement for systems supporting this module.
